alert.note: Alert for Carter; Greenup (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 2:17AM EDT until April 01 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Greenup County in northeastern Kentucky... Northwestern Carter County in northeastern Kentucky... Northwestern Meigs County in southeastern Ohio... Perry County in southeastern Ohio... Northwestern Gallia County in southeastern Ohio... Jackson County in southeastern Ohio... Morgan County in southeastern Ohio... Vinton County in southeastern Ohio... Western Athens County in southeastern Ohio... Northwestern Lawrence County in southeastern Ohio... * Until 300 AM EDT. * At 216 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Somerset to near Foxport, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Athens, Ironton, Jackson, Wellston, Nelsonville, New Lexington, Glouster, McConnelsville, Mcarthur, Oak Hill, Somerset, Albany, Shawnee, Chesterhill, Perry State Forest, Lake Hope State Park, Greenup, Greenbo Lake, Oldtown and Load. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
